Uses of Query in org.jooq
 

Classes in org.jooq with type parameters of type Query
 interface QueryProvider<Q extends Query>
          An object able to provide a query
 

Subinterfaces of Query in org.jooq
 interface DeleteQuery<R extends Record>
          A query used for deletion of data
 interface InsertQuery<R extends TableRecord<R>>
          A query for data insertion
 interface ResultProviderQuery<R extends Record>
          A Query that can provide a Result after execution
 interface ResultProviderSelectQuery<Q extends ResultProviderSelectQuery<Q,R>,R extends Record>
          A common interface for SelectQuery and SimpleSelectQuery
 interface Select
          A simpler version of the SelectQuery This object is a wrapper for an actual SelectQuery, only exposing a small API to allow you to model your SQL statements in Java as if they were actual SQL statements.
 interface SelectQuery
          A query for data selection
 interface SimpleSelect<R extends Record>
          A simple select query that provides Records from a single table, with no joins allowed.
 interface SimpleSelectQuery<R extends Record>
          A simple select query that provides Records from a single table, with no joins allowed.
 interface StoreQuery<R extends TableRecord<R>>
          A query storing objects to the database.
 interface UpdateQuery<R extends TableRecord<R>>
          A query for data updating
